name: get_media_download_link
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool instagram_looter.
Tool description: Access Instagram Data with Precision and Speed! Utilize Intelligent Request Filtering for Guaranteed 99.99% Response.
API description: Fetches an Instagram media download link for a given post, TV, or reel link.

link.description: The URL link of the Instagram media (post, TV, or reel).
